title: How to Change Your Xbox Account Password: Quick & Easy Guide

steps.title: Sign in to your Microsoft account on the Microsoft Security page.
steps.content: Sign in to your Microsoft account on the Microsoft Security page . You may be asked to complete identity verification via email or phone number when signing in.

steps.title: Type in your current password.
steps.content: Type in your current password. Your Xbox password and Microsoft account password are the same.

steps.title: Enter your new password twice.
steps.content: Enter your new password twice. Once you're done, click Save to finish changing your password. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Sign in to your Xbox 360.
steps.content: Sign in to your Xbox 360. You can't change your Microsoft password on the Xbox One or Xbox Series X/S.

steps.title: Open your Xbox 360's settings.
steps.content: Open your Xbox 360's settings. You can do this by scrolling to the right to find the Settings option.

steps.title: Navigate to Account > Your Information > Account Security.
steps.content: Navigate to Account > Your Information > Account Security . You'll need to scroll right to highlight Your Information .

steps.title: Select Change Password.
steps.content: Select Change Password . This will bring you to the screen where you can update your Microsoft account password.

steps.title: Fill in the required information.
steps.content: Fill in the required information. You'll need to enter your current password, and your new password twice.

steps.title: Select Change Now.
steps.content: Select Change Now . If you want to save the password to use with other Microsoft services, select Yes when prompted.
